comment: The transformation of matrices into polynomial matrices is "linear", analogous to ~ lmhmlin . Since ` A ` and ` C ` have different scalar rings, ` T ` cannot be a left module homomorphism as defined in ~ df-lmhm , see ~ lmhmsca . (Contributed by AV, 13-Nov-2019.) (Proof shortened by AV, 28-Nov-2019.)
